content: I worked with the Washington Post Opinion section and contributor David Byler as well as the Washington Post interactives team to create a unique interactive, that would let users game out different potential election scenarios based on the latest poll results.
html: I worked with the Washington Post Opinion section and contributor David Byler as well as the Washington Post interactives team to create a unique interactive, that would let users game out different potential election scenarios based on the latest poll results.
title: David Byler's Election Simulator
